content: Testing Out Yahoo!'s Site Builder Mobile SEO By: Rand Fishkin August 14, 2006 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin August 14, 2006 Testing Out Yahoo!'s Site Builder Mobile SEO The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. I thought it would be worth a shot to create a quick search industry tool with Yahoo!'s new site builder. I'd love your feedback on the results (as I'm sure Yahoo! would, too). Web Let's see how well this baby works. Remember - it's centered around the search marketing industry, so try to limit searches to somewhat relevant topics. Here's a few searches I tried: link building 301 redirect Canonical URLs Good book on SEO Google Sitemaps SEO Companies Site Audits Ken Jurina Not bad... I do wish I could seed it with a few sites and then ask it to also consider any sites that those sites link to. Copied! Back to Top

headers.text: With Moz Pro, you have the tools you need to get SEO right — all in one place.
